## Events

| Event    | Detail | Description                                             |
| -------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| `closed` |        | Event fired when the `side-sheet` has finished closing. |
| `opened` |        | Event fired when the `side-sheet` has finished opening. |
